snippet: Behind Kevin Durant, Russell Westbrook and a renewed defensive aggressiveness, the Thunder beat the Spurs to put an emphatic end to one of the great winning streaks in N.B.A. history.
abstract: Oklahoma City Thunder defeat San Antonio Spurs, 102-82, in Game 3 of the Western Conference finals; Spurs lead series, 2-1.
lead_paragraph: Behind Kevin Durant, Russell Westbrook and a renewed defensive aggressiveness, the Thunder beat the Spurs to put an emphatic end to one of the great winning streaks in N.B.A. history.

headline.seo: Rout by Thunder Ends Spurs’ Streak
headline.main: After 20 Straight Victories, the Spurs Take a Tumble in Oklahoma City
headline.print_headline: After 20 Straight Victories, the Spurs Take a Tumble in Oklahoma City
headline.content_kicker: Western Conference Finals Game 3: Thunder 102, Spurs 82
